channel.title: [Delta] 317 Adding Custom Weapons [Source Sided]
channel.description:
I added the models in raw folder, i never had a raw folder so i just simply made one and added the models in there.
I did everything changed item id to lower because my delta can only hold 10000. I added it Client sided no problem.
When i go on my account or any, the screen turns black an says connection error and i stay like that without getting out or in.
Please, i read the cmd and it says itemhandler i looked and their isn't anything wrong. Theirs a maxitem; 10000, and i added the items in item.cfg and it has 6505 items (including the new custom weapon)
